name: Sitri ~Shadow Walk~
description:
Dynamic third-person perspective action game
Sitri ~Shadow Walk~ contains a lot of explicit sex scenes
“As an agent of the Demon Lord's army who has infiltrated human society, you must seize the Holy Sword and carry out your mission.”
A high-ranking succubus who has infiltrated human society in the form of a Sister. “Sitri”
Together with her partner “Marie”, she engages in a variety of maneuvers to weaken the kingdom.
Wield the seized holy sword to eliminate obstacles or absorb power by Cum-squeezing.
They puppet their followers in their own strongholds and use them at various stages.
Soon the kingdom is helplessly sinking into sweet pleasures.
Battle Part
Dynamic third-person perspective action
Drain Event
Slay the enemies and drain all essence
Base Event
Your sex activities can puppet many followers at the Base
